comment.body: neat, how much did you pay to get it? Sounds like a nice device to implement mesh nets on, albeit the speed limitations.

> [zalex](#comment_5_1LWuc6JBhUGrKEAh1aPrPU85dEMcKmg3pS): About $13 with delivery (or $9 without).Also, there is cheaper model with 256 MB RAM, $11 / $7. At the moment "home server" uses less than 100 megabytes of RAM from 512, and this is with running nginx, aria2 and ssh-server.

awesome, that's half the price of the cheapest router here in Argentina. I will be getting one or two soon enough to get my hands dirty. Thanks a lot!
